disorder.flavor_text: No one knows where your mind goes when you're gone, not even you.
disorder.name: Absent Seizures
disorder.desc: The first time you would suffer a brain trauma each showdown, you are instead knocked down and forget a fighting art (erase it).

disorder.flavor_text: Even large, looming shadows make you jumpy.
disorder.name: Megalophobia
disorder.desc: You may not depart for hunts or showdowns with monsters that occupy more than 4 spaces on the showdown board.

disorder.flavor_text: You are deeply afraid of being the monster controller.
disorder.name: Controlophobia
disorder.desc: While you are the monster controller, double any damage you suffer.

disorder.flavor_text: When a fellow hunter perishes you lose control.
disorder.name: Revenge
disorder.desc: When a survivors dies during the showdown, suffer the Frenzy brain trauma.

disorder.flavor_text: You are irrationally scared by tiny spiders and the things they produce.
disorder.name: Tiny Arachnophobia
disorder.desc: You cannot carry any gear with the amber keyword. You cannot gain any resources with the silk keyword.

disorder.flavor_text: You love numbers. Your life must exist in perfect arithmetical harmony.
disorder.name: Arithmophilia
disorder.desc:
When you gain this disorder, roll 1d5. Your movement is that number.

Ignore all other movement modifiers.

disorder.flavor_text: You have a grand destiny that you must fulfill.
disorder.name: Destined
disorder.desc: If you do not depart, lose all survival and insanity.

disorder.flavor_text: You're not ready to love.
disorder.name: Performance Anxiety
disorder.desc:
You cannot be nominated for Intimacy.

Cure this disorder if you have 8+ courage.

disorder.flavor_text: Evil magic will be your undoing. You do not believe in abusing the other.
disorder.name: Superstitious
disorder.desc: You cannot activate or depart with other gear in your gear grid.

disorder.flavor_text: Predators of all shapes and sizes find your scent irresistible.
disorder.name: Delicious
disorder.desc: You are still considered a threat when you are knocked down (unless you use an effect that says otherwise).

disorder.flavor_text: You are delicate flower, wilting in the darkness.
disorder.name: Enfeebled
disorder.desc: It takes one less bleeding token to kill you.

disorder.flavor_text: Freedom awaits those pushed this far beyond the breaking point.
disorder.name: Stark Raving
disorder.desc: You are always insane, regardless of your insanity.

disorder.flavor_text: If you're not killing something, you're wasting your time.
disorder.name: Tunnel Vision
disorder.desc: When you spend <font class='kdm_font'>a</font>, you may only activate weapons.

disorder.flavor_text: You don't have any emotions. You've hidden this from everyone by mimicking their social interactions.
disorder.name: Emotionless
disorder.desc: You cannot gain +1 strength tokens.

disorder.flavor_text: You love the feeling of being needed.
disorder.name: Overprotective
disorder.desc: When an adjacent survivor is knocked down, you are also knocked down as you rush to their aid.

disorder.flavor_text: When your emotions rise, you can only think of violence.
disorder.name: Sun-Drunk
disorder.desc: When you have any +1 strength tokens, you cannot dash, dodge or g Run Away.

disorder.flavor_text: An insatiable hunger has bloomed in you, delicate and sickeningly sweet.
disorder.name: Flower Addiction
disorder.desc:
You may only depart to hunt the Flower Knight.

After you depart, cure this disorder.

disorder.flavor_text: You cannot experience fear if you do not exist.
disorder.name: Ghostly Beauty
disorder.desc:
Double all insanity you gain.

Double all survival you spend.

disorder.flavor_text: There is nothing in the world more beautiful than yourself.
disorder.name: Narcissistic
disorder.desc: You may not wear armor at the head location. If you are wearing armor at the head location when you gain this disorder, archive it.

disorder.flavor_text: Your will to survive has become indefatigable
disorder.name: Hyper-Sensitivity
disorder.desc:
You may dodge one additional time per round.

Whenever you are hit by an attack, you must dodge at least once, if possible.

disorder.flavor_text: The roads in your mind cross and reveal a strange new path.
disorder.name: Spiral Ganglia
disorder.desc: At the start of the showdown, gain the Darkness Awareness survivor status card.

disorder.flavor_text: Moving quickly makes you vomit.
disorder.name: Motion Sickness
disorder.desc: Whenever you suffer knockback, gain 1 bleeding token.

disorder.flavor_text: You love insects.
disorder.name: Vermin Obsession
disorder.desc: While there is a Bug Spot terrain tile on the showdown board, you are so overwhelmed that you are doomed.

disorder.flavor_text: The double-edged sword of fame is the only weapon you require.
disorder.name: Prima Donna
disorder.desc: Each survivor turn, you must take your act first (roll off each turn if multiple survivors have this disorder).

disorder.flavor_text: Yelling makes you feel light-headed.
disorder.name: Shallow Lungs
disorder.desc: When you encourage, you are knocked down.

disorder.flavor_text: You hate being the center of attention.
disorder.name: Stage Fright
disorder.desc: Whenever you become doomed or gain the priority target token, lose 1 survival.

disorder.flavor_text: Your mother always said you were born under a bad sign.
disorder.name: Unlucky
disorder.desc: You cannot critically wound.

fa.desc: When you are adjacent to the monster, you may spend <font class='kdm_font'>c</font> to place your survivor on any other space adjacent to the monster.
fa.name: Acrobatics

fa.desc:
Before making an attack, you may add your understanding to your accuracy attribute for that attack.

Limit, once per showdown.
fa.name: Champion's Rite

fa.desc: Once per showdown, you may give your next wound attempt +2 strength and Devastating 1.
fa.name: Fated Blow

fa.desc: Once per lantern year, you may ignore one of your severe injury roll results. If you do, gain a random disorder.
fa.name: Unbreakable

fa.desc:
At the start of the showdown, gain the Steadfast survivor status card.

When you are attacked, if you have 2+ steadfast tokens, ignore a hit and remove all your steadfast tokens.
fa.name: Carapace of Will

fa.desc:
At the start of a showdown, gain the Momentum survivor status card.

When you attack, if you have 5+ momentum tokens, remove them all and roll 1d10. Gain that amount of luck and strength when attempting to wound the first selected hit location for this attack.
fa.name: Propulsion Drive

fa.desc:
During the Hunt and Settlement phase, whenever you roll on a table, you may add +1 to the roll result. This may not exceed the highest possible result of that table.

(This includes Hunt Events, Story Events, Endeavors, Settlement Events, etc.)
fa.name: Otherworldly Luck

fa.desc: Once per showdown, you may spend <font class='kdm_font'>a</font> to give yourself a seizure. You suffer a random brain trauma and are knocked down.
fa.name: Lure Epilepsy

fa.desc: Gain +1 strength when attacking from adjacent spaces outside the monster's facing and blind spot.
fa.name: Mammoth Hunting

fa.desc: If you have 0 survival at the start of your act, gain 1 survival.
fa.name: Burning Focus

fa.desc: Once per showdown, if you are standing adjacent to the monster and have 3+ survival, you may spend all of your survival for one automatic hit that inflicts a critical wound.
fa.name: Heroic

fa.desc: Whenever a survivor dies during the showdown, roll 1d10. On a 7+, gain a Skull basic resource.
fa.name: Ruthless

fa.desc: If all of your attack rolls in an attack miss, you may spend 1 survival to re-roll all attack rolls.
fa.name: Unrelenting

fa.desc: When you become doomed or gain the priority target token, you may choose to gain +1 survival or +1 strength token.
fa.name: Headliner

fa.desc:
When your wound attempt on a hit location is a failure, you may put that hit location back on top of the deck instead of in the discard pile.

Limit, once per round.
fa.name: Tenacious

fa.desc: When you suffer a severe injury at a hit location, you may archive a gear worn at that location to ignore it and gain +1 survival.
fa.name: Wardrobe Expert

fa.desc:
The first time you wound the monster each attack, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity.

Ignore the effects of the Fear of the Dark and Prey disorders.
fa.name: Abyssal Sadist

fa.desc:
Whenever a random hunt event result is:

11, 22, 33, 44, 55, 66, 77, 88, 99 or 100,

the event revealer gains +1 understanding and +1 courage.
fa.name: Seasoned Hunter

fa.desc:
The hunting party may start the hunt phase 1 space closer to the monster.

At the start of the showdown, all survivors gain +1 survival and up to +1 insanity.
fa.name: Trailblazer

fa.desc:
When you gain a bleeding token, gain +1 survival and +1 insanity.

Ignore the effects of the Aichmophobia and Apathetic disorders.
fa.name: Transcended Masochist

fa.desc: When you suffer a brain trauma, gain a bleeding token.
fa.name: Blotted Out

fa.desc:
The first time you gain a resource during a showdown, you may feed it to your phantom friend. If you do, archive the resources and gain +1 evasion token.

Lose this token if you are deaf or become deaf during the showdown.
fa.name: Phantom Friend

fa.desc:
Gain +3 movement. Whenever you are knocked down, gain -1 movement token.

If you have the Tiny Arachnophobia disorder, you are too scared of spiders to imitate them and you cannot use this fighting art.
fa.name: Harvestman

fa.desc: When a survivor dies during the showdown, gain +4 survival and +1 strength token.
fa.name: Vengeance

fa.desc: When you are instructed to Skip the Next Hunt, ignore it. The 'Skip Next Hunt' box on your survivor record sheet cannot be filled in.
fa.name: Burning Ambition

fa.desc:
When a survivor adjacent to you is knocked down, you may spend 1 survival. If you do, they stand and gain +1 survival from your words of encouragement.

You cannot use this if you have a broken jaw.
fa.name: Defender

fa.desc:
Your comrades make you strong enough to exceed the limits of death itself.

During the showdown, if you would gain a lethal number of bleeding tokens while there are any other standing survivors, roll 1d10. On a 6+, you live but are knocked down. You will not bleed to death until you gain another bleeding token.
fa.name: Purpose

fa.desc: When you attack a monster from its blind spot, gain +4 strength for that attack.
fa.name: Sneak Attack

fa.desc: Once per showdown, when you wound a monster from its blind spot, a survivor adjacent to you may gain the priority target token.
fa.name: Trick Attack

sfa.desc:
Once per showdown, you may spend a to shove an adjacent obstacle terrain. If you do, move the train directly away from you in a straight line until it encounters a board edge or another obstacle terrain. Any monsters the train passes over suffer a wound, and any survivors it collides with suffer knockback 7.

The display of strength is so exhausting it ages you. You are knocked down and gain +1 Hunt XP.
sfa.name: Beetle Strength

sfa.desc: If you would gain a negative attribute token, gain a positive attribute token of that type instead.
sfa.name: Altered Destiny

sfa.desc:
Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a monster's brain. They gain -2 accuracy until the end of the round.

Once per round, you may spend 1 survival to freeze a survivor's brain, killing them instantly. They die.
sfa.name: Frozen Star

sfa.desc:
You may wear up to 3 Satchel gear cards.

When you depart, if you are not wearing any armor, for each green affinity you have, gain +1 strength token and add 1 to all hit locations.

Spend a and a Flower or Fresh Acanthus resource to heal a permanent injury you or an adjacent survivor suffered this showdown.
sfa.name: Acanthus Doctor

sfa.desc:
Ignore Parry when attempting to wound hit locations. (Attempt to wound these locations normally.)

When a monster attacks you, roll 1d10. On a 6+, ignore 1 hit. Limit, once per round.
sfa.name: Fencing

sfa.desc:
All swords in your gear grid gain deadly.

Gain +3 luck when attacking with a sword if you have the Ghostly Beauty and Narcissistic disorders.
sfa.name: True Blade

sfa.desc: If you are on an unoccupied space, you stand firm in the face of any force. You cannot be knocked down and may ignore knockback. (If you occupy the same space as a monster, impassable terrain tile, or another survivor, you are knocked down and suffer knockback.)
sfa.name: Immovable Object

sfa.desc:
When you depart, gain 1 shield to all hit locations for each gear card in your grid with the symbol keyword.

If you would roll on the severe injury table, roll on the Worm Trauma table on the other side of this card instead.

When you die or forget this, the settlement gains the Knowledge Worm innovation.
sfa.name: Necromancer

sfa.desc:
[1-3]: A spray of blood and silver. Dead.
[4-5]: The worm's coil tightens sharply. Gain 2 bleeding tokens and -1 evasion token.
[6-7]: A dizzying blow. Gain 1 bleeding token and 1d5 insanity.
[8]: An inhuman voice screams in your bones. Gain 1 bleeding token and 1d5 insanity.
[9]: The pain is infuriating! Gain 1 bleeding token and + 1 strength token.
[10]: Molten metal issues from your mouth. You are knocked down and gain 1 iron strange resource.
sfa.name: Worm Trauma table

sfa.desc:
When yu gain Hunt XP, you may decide not to gain it.

When you depart, you may rotate up to 3 gear cards in your gear grid. This changes the location of their affinities and arrows. Otherwise, the gear functions normally.
sfa.name: Ageless Apprentice

sfa.desc: At the start of the showdown, secretly write down on a scrap of paper which survivors will live and who will deal the killing blow. During the aftermath, if your predictions were correct, raise the settlement's Survival Limit by 1.
sfa.name: Courtly Screenwriter

sfa.desc:
Gain +1 accuracy and +1 strength for each permanent injury you have.

You may always depart, even when retired.
sfa.name: Eternal Will

sfa.desc:
At the start of the showdown, gain the Path of Gloom survivor status card.

There is a deadly, otherworldly presence about you. Other survivors cannot voluntarily end their movement adjacent to you.
sfa.name: Clarity of Darkness

sfa.desc:
Gain +1 accuracy when attacking with Fist & Tooth.

When you wound a monster, it gains -1 toughness until the end of your attack.

You cannot use this if you are male.
sfa.name: Death Touch

sfa.desc:
0:nothing
1:You may spend a while adjacent to another survivor to add 2 shield to one of their hit locations.
2:While all armor in your gear grid is silk and all jewelry is amber, gain +2 evasion.
3:During the aftermath, roll 1d10 for each other survivor that died during the showdown. On a 7+, revive them.
sfa.name: Silk Surgeon

sfa.desc:
You cannot lose or remove this fighting art.

Gain +1 strength for each full red affinity you have. You cannot be nominated for Intimacy. You ignore Extreme Heat.

At the start of your act, lose 1 survival. At the end of your act, if your survival is 0 or you have any +1 strength tokens, your organs cook themselves and you die.
sfa.name: Hellfire

sfa.desc:
Your body mysteriously absorbs light. At the start of the showdown, gain survival up to the settlement's Survival Limit.

If you have any +1 strength tokens, you may spend them all to perform the Surge survival action (following all of its normal rules and restrictions).
sfa.name: Sun Eater

sfa.desc:
You no longer cast a shadow and you never hesitate. Ignore First Strike.

On a Perfect Hit, your first wound attempt of the attack automatically succeeds and inflicts a critical wound.

If you die during the showdown, place a Shade minion in the space you occupied.
sfa.name: Suppressed Shadow

sfa.desc:
Swords in your gear grid gain Block 1.

When you block a hit with a sword, your next attack that round with a sword gains +2 accuracy, +2 strength, +2 speed. Limit, once per round.

During the settlement phase you may spend d to train a survivor. They gain the Black Guard Style secret fighting art. You lose it and suffer the broken arm severe injury.
sfa.name: Black Guard Style
